p: The antimalarial medicinal plants itemized by the respondents were structured according to the scientific, common, and local names, family, plant part used, and mode of preparation. The malarial diseases' symptoms and probable health effects or body reactions were reported. Data were statistically analysed in percentages using Graphpad Prism software (version 6.0) The comparative significance of a plant species for its ethnopharmacological activity was evaluated with the Index of Use Value (UV) and efficiency level (EL).
